text: Tum sab ko Allah hi kay pass jana hai Allah ney sacha wada ker rakha hai. Be-shak wohi pehli baar bhi peda kerta hai phir wohi doobara bhi peda keray ga takay aisay logon ko jo kay eman laye aur unhon ney nek kaam kiye insaf kay sath jaza dey aur jin logon ney kufur kiya unn kay wastay kholta hua pani peenay ko milay ga aur dard naak azab hoga unn kay kufur ki waja say
